::Spears::

She feels the pod take off and she jumps into a seat.  She stares 
down at her feet trying to avoid loking out the windows.  Trying to 
keep her panic at bay, she keeps the subsect going. 
"So..ah..what do you do for training?" her voice getting shaky.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker looks at Spears as she offers him company. He was used to 
training 
> alone, but company might be welcome. "I ussually train solo, but 
company 
> wouldn't hurt, I guess."
> 
> "Power recharged. Ready for takeoff."
> 
> He turns his head to look at the computer as it reports that, 
standing up. 
> "Allright, let's fly."
> 
> He presses a few buttons on the console, the pod taking off again.
